title: SMC_TRAFO_Gantry2Tool1 (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_TRAFO_Gantry2Tool1
Reverse transformations for gantry systems with tool offset.
The tool is approximated by a line.
Note
For detailed information on transformations
see overview to
SM_Trafo_POUs
.

rows.Name: pi
rows.Comment: Target vector position (x,y), ouptput of interpolator

rows:
Angle indicating orientation of tool, can be calculated by
use ofSMC_CalcDirectionFromVector
Tool size = distance( set position) - (machine position)
